items.title: Desk Diva
items.description: Small size, big mood. This cutie owns your desk and knows it.

items.title: Pink Tripod Queen
items.description: Legs for days and lighting to slay — she's the queen of your living room.

items.title: Glam Corner
items.description: Serving soft light and serious drama. Perfect for a velvet chair moment.

items.title: Bubble Dome
items.description: Cute, curvy, and full of glow. It’s giving “Barbie goes architectural.

items.title: Study Crush
items.description: Adorably focused. Makes spreadsheets, books, and to-do lists look way cuter.

items.title: Glow Pop
items.description: Big, bold, and blushing. Your space just got a power move in pink.

items.title: Desert Bloom
items.description: Soft curves, warm gold, and just enough mystery to keep them guessing.

items.title: Mirage Chandelier
items.description: Light dances like a desert illusion — ornate, golden, unforgettable.

items.title: Sultan's Halo
items.description: Regal glow with timeless grace. Fit for modern palaces and calm retreats.

items.title: Moon Over Marrakesh
items.description: Layers of gold and patterned light — like a lullaby on your ceiling.

items.title: Kasbah Ember
items.description: Rustic warmth, vintage bronze, and ancient soul. Lights the room like a secret.

items.title: Blue Oasis
items.description: Cool tones in a warm world. Stained glass meets storybook scholar energy.

items.title: Salon Royale
items.description: Graceful curves and golden accents — the chandelier your living room was born to host.

items.title: Belle Époque
items.description: Vintage charm in a soft white dome. Quiet, confident, and classically French.

items.title: Ivory Crown
items.description: Smooth, minimal, and regal. A ceiling light with subtle power.

items.title: Sunset Lover
items.description: A table lamp that glows like sunset through velvet curtains. Pure comfort with polish.

items.title: Maison Muse
items.description: Soft fabric shade, sculpted base. This lamp belongs in a perfectly styled sitting room.

items.title: Opaline Empire
items.description: Grand, glowing, and masterfully balanced — a chandelier made for elegant gatherings.

items.title: The Mogul
items.description: Confident, clean, and commanding — a golden desk companion for leaders and dealmakers.

items.title: Golden Hour
items.description: Curved perfection with retro charm — brings timeless sophistication to any reading corner.

items.title: Dome of Desire
items.description: Smooth, sculptural, and seductive — a bold accent that adds instant allure and elegance.

items.title: Empress Halo
items.description: A grand ceiling centerpiece radiating luxury, grace, and undeniable old-Hollywood glamour.

items.title: Legacy Luxe
items.description: Classic form meets gold indulgence — designed for those who inherit taste, not follow trends.

items.title: Gilded Muse
items.description: A romantic blend of art and light, crafted to inspire every golden-hour moment.

items.title: Sunday Glow
items.description: Warm light and clean lines — like a lazy morning that never has to end.

items.title: Honey Drop
items.description: Golden base, soft shade — a sweet little accent for your coziest corners.

items.title: Pillow Talk
items.description: Tall, calm, and softly glowing — perfect for evenings of books, chats, and daydreams.

items.title: Cloud Nine
items.description: Ceiling-mounted serenity with a floating form — gentle light, maximum comfort vibes.

items.title: Glow Jar
items.description: A glowing orb in a glass shell — like bottling up calm for your nightstand.

items.title: Still Light
items.description: Minimalist, modern, and meditative — the ceiling lamp that breathes peace into any space.

items.title: Iron Mind
items.description: Industrial strength, clean curves — a focused beam for thinkers, makers, and late-night strategists.

items.title: Soft Logic
items.description: Smooth, clean, and smart — minimal desk lighting with maximum practical clarity.

items.title: Mono Frame
items.description: A bold ceiling circle, matte and modern — lighting that defines a space without dominating it.

items.title: Float
items.description: Layered geometry meets ambient calm — like a halo hovering quietly above your living space.

items.title: Neo Silence
items.description: Weightless design with silent luxury — it doesn't shout, it settles the whole room.

items.title: White Code
items.description: Clean-lined brilliance, light-diffused balance — a minimalist's dream in perfect architectural symmetry.
